Models¶

class bhp_appointment.models.BaseAppointment(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_sync.classes.base_sync_model.BaseSyncModel

Base class for Appointments.

Parameters:
  • appt_datetime (DateTimeField) – Appointment date and time
  • timepoint_datetime (DateTimeField) – calculated appointment datetime. Do not change
  • appt_status (CharField) – Status
  • appt_reason (CharField) – Reason for appointment
  • contact_tel (CharField) – Contact tel
  • comment (CharField) – Comment
class bhp_appointment.models.Appointment(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_appointment.models.base_appointment.BaseAppointment

Tracks appointments for a registered subject’s visit.

Only one appointment per subject visit_definition+visit_instance. Attribute ‘visit_instance’ should be populated by the system.

Name :

appointment
Table :

bhp_appointment_appointment
Parameters:
  • appt_datetime (DateTimeField) – Appointment date and time
  • timepoint_datetime (DateTimeField) – calculated appointment datetime. Do not change
  • appt_status (CharField) – Status
  • appt_reason (CharField) – Reason for appointment
  • contact_tel (CharField) – Contact tel
  • comment (CharField) – Comment
  • registered_subject_id (ForeignKey) – Registered subject
  • best_appt_datetime (DateTimeField) – Best appt datetime
  • study_site_id (ForeignKey) – Study site
  • visit_definition_id (ForeignKey) – For tracking within the window period of a visit, use the decimal convention. Format is NNNN.N. e.g 1000.0, 1000.1, 1000.2, etc)
  • visit_instance (CharField) – A decimal to represent an additional report to be included with the original visit report. (NNNN.0)
  • dashboard_type (CharField) – hold dashboard_type variable, set by dashboard
is_dispatched¶

Returns lock status as a boolean needed when using this model with bhp_dispatch.

is_dispatched_to_producer()¶

Returns lock status as a boolean needed when using this model with bhp_dispatch.

class bhp_appointment.models.Configuration(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_base_model.classes.base_uuid_model.BaseUuidModel

Only allows a single record.

Name :

configuration
Table :

bhp_appointment_configuration
Parameters:
  • allowed_iso_weekdays (IntegerField) – List ISO weekdays to which appointments may be scheduled. For example, 12345 where 1 is Monday.
  • use_same_weekday (BooleanField) – If Ticked, adjust the appointment date to have appointments always land on the same weekday.
